q1.question: What is TourlyAI?
q1.answer: TourlyAI is a desktop application that uses Artificial Intelligence and Natural Language Processing to analyze reviews from tourism destinations. It extracts sentiments, identifies categories and topics, generates intelligent summaries, and provides strategic recommendations.

q2.question: Who is it designed for?
q2.answer: Tourism professionals, hospitality managers, destination marketing organizations, tour operators, hotel managers, and anyone who needs to understand what guests are saying about their tourism experience.

q3.question: Is my data safe?
q3.answer: Absolutely. TourlyAI processes everything locally on your computer. Your reviews never leave your machine. You can use the fully offline local AI mode for maximum privacy.

q4.question: Do I need technical knowledge?
q4.answer: Not at all. TourlyAI includes a setup wizard that handles everything automatically. Just upload your CSV file, click 'Run Analysis', and explore the results.

q5.question: What languages does it support?
q5.answer: The interface is available in English and Spanish. The AI sentiment model supports reviews in English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, and more.

q6.question: Is it free?
q6.answer: Yes, TourlyAI is free and open-source under the MIT license. You can download, use, and modify it without any cost.

q7.question: What are the system requirements?
q7.answer: Windows desktop with at least 8 GB of RAM and 3 GB of free disk space. A dedicated GPU is recommended for faster processing but not required.

q8.question: Why does Windows show a security warning when installing?
q8.answer: TourlyAI is not yet code-signed with a commercial certificate, so Windows may block it. The easiest fix: (1) Right-click the .exe → Properties. (2) Check the 'Unblock' checkbox at the bottom → Apply. Then open the file normally. If SmartScreen still appears, click 'More info' → 'Run anyway'. The app is 100% safe — the full source code is available on GitHub for anyone to review.
